extensionAttribute.description: Reports the effective checking method of Microsoft AutoUpdate for Mac
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh if [ -d /Library/Application\ Support/Microsoft/MAU2.0/Microsoft\ AutoUpdate.app ]; then HowToCheck=`python -c "from Foundation import CFPreferencesCopyAppValue; print CFPreferencesCopyAppValue('HowToCheck', 'com.microsoft.autoupdate2')"` echo "<result>$HowToCheck</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
exit 0
